meanings.definition: A type of Italian bread made with wheat flour and yeast.
meanings.sent1: I bought a fresh ciabatta from the bakery.
meanings.sent2: The ciabatta was perfect for making garlic bread.
meanings.sent3: The ciabatta loaf looked like a fluffy cloud on the table.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the warm ciabatta filled the kitchen like a comforting hug.
meanings.sent5: The crust of the ciabatta crackled as I broke it apart, revealing the soft interior.

meanings.definition: A sandwich made with ciabatta bread.
meanings.sent1: For lunch, I enjoyed a delicious ciabatta filled with ham and cheese.
meanings.sent2: The ciabatta sandwich was a hit at the picnic.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally squished my ciabatta sandwich, but it still tasted great.
meanings.sent4: The ciabatta sandwich was a tower of flavors and textures.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the ciabatta added a delightful contrast to the sandwich fillings.
